com.ekkongames.elib.gui

Class UITextBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ekkongames.elib.gui.UIElement
      • com.ekkongames.elib.gui.UITextBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UIPasswordBox

    public class UITextBox
extends UIElement
    A UITextBox is a rectangular text input. This particular implementation provides various capabilities such as selecting text and copying and pasting.
